oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Elevator Greeting - Bobby Hebb - 2004-mm-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Museum greeting recorded by Bobby Hebb for use in the museum visitor elevators during the exhibit Night Train to Nashville, beginning in 2004.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bobby Hebb;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Includes numerous takes and false starts.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hebb, Bobby; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
